PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-09532008-05-15,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActFirst Nations Goods and Services Tax Act
PrecisApproval to enter into a TAX ADMINISTRATION AGREEMENT with the NISGA'A NATION pursuant to which the Government of Canada will collect and administer the First Nations Goods and Services Tax (FNGST) for them and the GST will no longer apply where the FNGST applies.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
